Game Notes


Daniel Alfredsson from the Ottawa Senators wins the 2008 OTHL All-Star Most Valuable Player
Mike Keenan (New York Islanders) coached the Eastern Conference All-Stars
Ted Nolan (Chicago) coached the Western Conference All-Stars
Joe Sakic was captain for the Western All-Stars
Nicklas Lidström was captain for the Eastern All-Stars
